channel.title: Yet another help topic
channel.description:
[size=40pt][b]FIXED![/b][/size]
this time I updated Java and changed the "8's" in Compile.Bat to 9's, and it gives me this error...
[code]'"C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe"' is not recognized as an inte rnal or external command, operable program or batch file.[/code]
I changed them back to 8's and yet again, I get:
[code]'"C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_08\bin\javac.exe"' is not recognized as an inte rnal or external command, operable program or batch file.[/code]
This is what my Compile.Bat has when I edit:
[code]@echo off COLOR 08 title GloryScape Client "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -cp .;jdic.jar; *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe" -cp .;jdic.jar; ServerManager pause[/code]
Anyone want to explain to me why five minutes ago my compile was fine, then I updated now and edited the Compile and now it won't work.
Thanks!

item.title: Yet another help topic
item.dc:creator: @krisdude krisdude
item.description:
@krisdude wrote:

[size=40pt]FIXED![/size]

this time I updated Java and changed the “8’s” in Compile.Bat to 9’s, and it gives me this error…

'"C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe"' is not recognized as an inte rnal or external command, operable program or batch file.

I changed them back to 8’s and yet again, I get:

'"C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_08\bin\javac.exe"' is not recognized as an inte rnal or external command, operable program or batch file.

This is what my Compile.Bat has when I edit:

@echo off COLOR 08 title GloryScape Client "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -cp .;jdic.jar; *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe" -cp .;jdic.jar; ServerManager pause

Anyone want to explain to me why five minutes ago my compile was fine, then I updated now and edited the Compile and now it won’t work.

Thanks!

Read full topic
